data.eml:eml: A new species of genus Neoaloa Singh & Kirti, 2015 from Bihar, India (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae: Arctiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Singh, Navneet, Joshi, Rahul, Ahmad, Jalil (2018): A new species of genus Neoaloa Singh & Kirti, 2015 from Bihar, India (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae: Arctiini). Zootaxa 4486 (2): 189-194, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.2.8
